ETC.name: Powerslide
ETC.description: Slide to a location dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies hit for 1.25 second.

ETC.name: Face Melt
ETC.description: Deals 68 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back.

ETC.name: Guitar Solo
ETC.description: Regenerate 66 (+4% per level) Health per second for 4 seconds.

ETC.name: Mosh Pit
ETC.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

ETC.name: Stage Dive
ETC.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 4 seconds.

ETC.name: Rockstar
ETC.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 20 Armor for 2 seconds. Heroic Abilities grant 60 Armor.

1.name: Guitar Hero
1.description: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 60% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.  Basic Attacks increase the duration of Guitar Solo by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Prog Rock
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100  Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

1.name: Block Party
1.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

4.name: Crowd Surfer
4.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain. If no enemies are hit, reduce the cooldown by 7 seconds and refund the Mana cost.

4.name: Loud Speakers
4.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

4.name: Speed Metal
4.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 20% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Pinball Wizard
7.description: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

7.name: Hammer-on
7.description: While Guitar Solo is active your Basic Attacks deal 35% more damage.

7.name: Echo Pedal
7.description: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 18 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 200% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

10.name: Mosh Pit
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Stage Dive
10.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Mic Check
13.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

13.name: Encore
13.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.  Passive: Each enemy Hero hit by Face Melt or the Amp reduces your Heroic Ability cooldown by 5%.

13.name: Face Smelt
13.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.

16.name: Show Stopper
16.description: After using Powerslide, gain 35 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 35%.

16.name: Aggressive Shredding
16.description: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Tour Bus
20.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Crowd Pleaser
20.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its Slow is increased by 30%.

20.name: Death Metal
20.description: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
